events.title: Mountain Trail Adventure
events.description: Experience the thrill of mountain trails with fellow bikers. Perfect for adventure seekers! Includes camping under the stars and professional guides.
events.rules: Must have off-road experience, proper gear required, valid license

events.title: Coastal Highway Ride
events.description: Ride along the beautiful coastal highway with stunning ocean views. Breakfast and lunch included!
events.rules: Valid license, road-ready bike required, group riding etiquette

events.title: Desert Sunset Rally
events.description: Experience the magic of desert sunset rides. Camping under the stars and bonfire night included.
events.rules: Bring camping gear, plenty of water, warm clothing for night

events.title: Weekend Warrior Training
events.description: Improve your riding skills with professional trainers. Perfect for beginners and intermediate riders!
events.rules: Bring your own bike, safety gear provided, prior riding experience helpful

events.title: Monsoon Magic Ride
events.description: Experience the lush green Western Ghats during monsoon. Waterfalls, misty mountains, and thrilling curves!
events.rules: Rain gear mandatory, experienced riders only, bike should have good tires

events.title: Leh-Ladakh Expedition
events.description: The ultimate bikers paradise! Ride through the highest motorable roads in the world.
events.rules: High altitude experience required, bike must be in perfect condition, medical fitness mandatory

events.title: Goa Beach Ride
events.description: Ride through beautiful beaches, enjoy sea food and bonfire nights with fellow bikers.
events.links: Casual ride, all skill levels welcome, beach party included
